title: The Last Wave DVD Rip (Peter Weir 1977)
description:
This is the 1977 Peter Weir film &#039;The Last Wave DVD Rip&#039; ripped with Magic DVD Ripper.

Video:720x416 xVid

Audio:192kbps

Running Time: 1:45:52

There is a much better quality (I would imagine) 7 gb version on tpb, I thought I&#039;d offer this alternative that I used to have up on Demonoid before &#039;the enemy&#039; got to it. 

The audio in this goes ever so slightly out of sync, but I don&#039;t think it is that noticeable, I&#039;ve tried my best to fix it using some synch repairing tools, feel free to comment on how bad it is.

Please download the sample before the whole thing to see if it meets your standards (it\&#039;s slightly compressed of course, so it looks ALOT blockier than the main file which is very clear, but it&#039;s mainly for the audio).

I was planning on uploading the 1968 film Targets here too, but I see there is one up already, and has a bunch of leechers but no seeders as far as I can see, so if someone knows if you can actually finish downloading that torrent please tell me if you can&#039;t and I&#039;ll upload mine.

And PLEASE SEED!!! I have 30kbps max upload so it&#039;s going to go very slow to begin with and onwards if people don&#039;t seed for a long time after they&#039;ve finished downloading (some permanent seeders would be great).
